summary: Diff implements expanded game registry metadata (tags/difficulty), hub discovery controls (search + category filter), and displays new metadata across Hub, Game Shell, and All Leaderboards. It also includes styling changes aimed at keeping the hub grid readable at larger scales. Registry validation is claimed in summaries but is not directly visible in the truncated `gameRegistry.ts` snippet.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual theme/palette changes (warm amber/orange OKLCH tokens) and added utility classes unrelated to the catalog/search/filter requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on expanding the catalog, adding metadata fields, hub discovery controls, and registry validation; it does not request a new color palette/theme update.
